original_text:
And the words of the Lord are flawless,
    like silver purified in a crucible,
    like gold refined seven times.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀은 순결함이여 흙 도가니에 일곱 번 단련한 은 같도다

sentences.original_text: And the words of the Lord are flawless
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 말씀은 흠 없이 완전하며

sentences.original_text: like silver purified in a crucible
